response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would also be a valuable addition to your collection or business. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000, which reflects its true worth while allowing you to secure a significant saving. We trust that you will appreciate the quality and benefits it offers, making it a worthwhile investment. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
